thread.section_title: Choice Home Warranty Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Choice Home Warranty | www.choicehomewarranty.com
thread.title: Thomas Boyer
thread.title_full: Choice Home Warranty reviewed by Thomas Boyer

author: Thomas Boyer
title: Thomas Boyer
text: After I had purchased Choice Home Warranty I had ta few claims, clothes dryer, stove/oven. These were handled quickly and the contracted service personnel were on time and repaired both issues. A while later the repair on the oven failed and they replaced it. Then within a week I had issues with some plumbing. This one took awhile to get resolved only because the ones contacted to correct the issue failed to respond. Once again the issue was resoled and for now all is well.
